1370: Helpriko was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Nimme at age 24 in 1370.
Had a son with Nimme, Sander, at age 24.
1372: Had a daughter with Nimme, Rycaldis, at age 26.
1374: Had a son with Nimme, Richolfus, at age 28.
1375: Had a daughter with Nimme, Euffemia, at age 29.
Lost son Richolfus when Richolfus was 2 years old.
1379: Had a son with Nimme, Pieter, at age 33.
1381: Had a daughter with Nimme, Marisseis, at age 35.
1382: Lost his wife Nimme while she was giving birth to Gloria in 1382.
